title: The Impact of Active Recall on Long-Term Memory Retention
description: A study exploring the effectiveness of active recall techniques in enhancing memory retention over extended periods.

title: Integrating Neuroscience into Educational Practices
description: An overview of how neuroscience findings can inform and improve educational practices, focusing on brain-based learning strategies.

title: The Role of Metacognition in Children's Learning
description: An investigation into the development of metacognitive skills in children and their impact on academic performance.
